name: Aida The Game
description:
Aida The Game is a narrative game based on the Simon memory game concept where you have to match color sequences of increasing difficulty, and on the Aida opera.

This game was created during the Jam Nation game jam in Montreal in June 2016 by the Spearhead Games team.

The game is played with two players and both players must match the sequence to reveal part of Aida's story. While the two players are playing, the audience can log in to a website at bit.ly/jamnations and vote for a debuff to be applied to the next act.

Use the A/B/X/Y buttons on an Xbox controller (or Cross/Square/Triangle/Circle on PS4) to play.

Make sure you have stereo sound (speakers) to play this game!
